interactivity.requirements: 30 Sana Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Girl Talk Pt. II " Seen " The Girl in the Black Dress " from Sana Sakakibara

progression.synopsis: Sensei finds an unexpectedly inebriated Sana at the bar. She has been "medicated" by Sara , who decides to leave Sensei and Sana to talk. Sana has been thinking about their encounter with a strange girl while out walking, particularly the girl's statement that "he is happy now". Sana reminds Sensei that she had a brother. Sespite thinking that the strange girl's words are probably nonsense, Sana still can't help wondering if the girl somehow knew something. After Sana decides to change the topic, Sensei notes again how much she dislikes the idea of Sensei getting together with her mother. Sana continues to self-medicate until she falls asleep.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.9p1.
